title: Dafi Facial make-up remover (micellar water)
description:
• Dafi micellar water is a very strong and effective solution to remove facial impurities, hydrates and increases the freshness and clarity of the skin.
  • Deep and fast cleanser of cosmetics, fat and dirt from the skin

0.title: Micellar water for normal to very dry skin
0.description:
• Contains hyaluronic acid, vitamins E and 5B to hydrate and maintain skin moisture
  • Enriched with cucumber and aloe vera extracts to nourish and rejuvenate, increases transparency, softness and freshness of the skin.

1.title: Micellar water for oily and acne prone skin
1.description:
• Controls the amount of skin oil and prevent acne
  • Contains hyaluronic acid, vitamins B5 and A, to hydrate and maintain skin moisture
  • Enriched with nutrients such as tea tree oil, cucumber, pomegranate and lemon extracts to increase clarity, softness and freshness of the skin.
